history.proof: intros a b c. unfold eqTerm, plusTerm, multTerm. hauto l: on depth: 3use: plusA_eqA_comp_l, multTerm, multA_eqA_comp_l, multA_dist_r.

exceptions.tactic: rewrite (multA_dist_r cs (multTerm a c) (multTerm b c) c).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : Term The term "cs" has type "CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA" while it is expected to have type "Set".

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : Term The term "cs" has type "CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA" while it is expected to have type "Set".

exceptions.tactic: rewrite (plusA_eqA_comp_l cs (multA a c) (multA b c) (multA (plusA a b) c) (multA_eqA_comp_l cs a b c)).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b, c : Term The term "cs" has type "CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA" while it is expected to have type "Set".
Cannot find a relation to rewrite.

original: intros a b c. unfold eqTerm, plusTerm, multTerm. rewrite (multA_dist_r cs (multTerm a c) (multTerm b c) c). rewrite (multA_dist_r cs a b c). rewrite (plusA_eqA_comp_l cs (multA a c) (multA b c) (multA (plusA a b) c) (multA_eqA_comp_l cs a b c)). reflexivity.
